name: Tank Mechanic Simulator VR: Prologue
description:
Welcome to the Prologue of Tank Mechanic Simulator VR! Here you will get a chance of experiencing some of the game mechanics for free!

Find the legendary Panzerkampfwagen VI Tiger inside your garage and restore it using multiple available tools.


Supported VR goggles/headsets:
HTC Cosmos
HTC Cosmos Elite
HTC Vive
HTC Vive Pro
Microsoft Mixed Reality (VR, not AR)
Oculus Quest (link)
Oculus Quest 2 (link)
Oculus Rift
Oculus Rift S
Steam VR
Valve Index
